Social Media Assistant (Volunteer) Job at Fast Fix Consult




        
    

        
        Fast Fix Consult, a Recruitment Company, is recruiting suitable candidates to fill the position below:

Job Position: Social Media Assistant (Volunteer)

Job Location: Nigeria (Remote)

Description


	We’re looking for a creative volunteer to help manage and post content on Telegram, WhatsApp, Facebook, Instagram, and more.


Skills Required
     

            
    




	Experience in online community management / social media management
	Proficiency in using ChatGPT / AI tools for content writing
	Basic design skills with AI tools or Canva
	Strong communication skills & consistency in posting.


Benefit


	This is a remote position with a N10,000 – N30,000 data allowance provided monthly.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: fastfixconsult@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the mail.

Note


	This is a volunteer role with data allowance only (not a salary).
	If your current job will affect your commitment, please do not apply.
	Join us and grow your skills while making an impact!

Content Creator Specialist Job at GIG Mobility




        
    

        
        GIG Mobility, formerly known as God is Good Motors (GIGM), is a Nigerian transportation and logistics company that has evolved from a traditional bus service to a technology-driven platform.Founded in 1998 by Edwin and Stella Ajaere, it initially focused on intercity bus travel within Nigeria.In 2010, under the leadership of their son, Chidi Ajaere, the company underwent a significant transformation, rebranding as GIG Mobility and integrating technology to enhance its operations and expand its services

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Content Creator Specialist

Job Location: Lagos 
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Description
     

            
    




	We are looking for a vibrant female Content Creator Specialist who is not more than 27 years and is ready to work in a team with the ability to perform the responsibilities below


Responsibilities
Strategy & Planning:


	Collaborate with the marketing department to understand short- and long-term business goals
	Develop and implement integrated content strategies across channels
	Stay ahead of industry trends and proactively recommend content campaigns
	Research and implement SEO tactics to increase organic traffic and brand visibility
	Contribute ideas for campaign themes, content pillars, and storytelling frameworks


Copywriting & Content Creation:


	Write clear, engaging, and strategic copy for website, social media, ads, emails, blogs, scripts, and podcast episodes etc.
	Draft and maintain engaging copy across public communications and branded platforms
	Convert customer needs and feedback into customer-centric storytelling


Social Media Management:


	Manage day-to-day content scheduling, posting, and monitoring across Instagram, TikTok, Facebook, X, and LinkedIn
	Use tools (e.g., Meta Suite, Buffer, Notion) to keep calendars updated and performance tracked
	Interact with the audience and grow community engagement and loyalty


Video Creation:


	Create mobile-first short-form video content(Reels, TikToks, etc.) using just your phone + editing tools
	Record, script, and edit authentic, brand-aligned visual content
	Optimize videos for platform performance and virality to grab customer attention


Visual Content & Design:


	Use tools like Canva, Figma, or Adobe Expressto design basic static and motion graphics
	Collaborate with designers when higher complexity is needed, but lead with fast-turnaround visuals
	Contribute to brand aesthetics including logo treatments, taglines, and promotional designs


Content Optimization & Reporting:


	Track content engagement, reach, and performance metrics
	Analyze web and social data to optimize strategies and adjust quickly
	Use insights to improve traffic, conversions, and user retention


Compliance & Consistency:


	Ensure content aligns with brand voice, history, and future plans
	Ensure all content adheres to copyright and data protection laws
	Maintain consistency across platforms and campaigns


Content Marketing Executive Requirements


	Minimum of BSc Degree / Hnd in a related field.
	Content marketing, social media, or creative production experience.
	A focus on content marketing for a B2B technology business could be in a pure content role or a broader marketing role with some content marketing.
	Excellent writing skills and the ability to communicate at all levels.
	Track record of producing a wide variety of content.
	Video editing would be an advantage.
	Must present Portfolios with links to your writing samples and video content is required.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: jobs@thegiggroupng.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.

{

  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Digital Content Marketing Manager",
  "description": "Ravenpay Limited is a leading fintech company that provides financial services to individuals and organizations across Africa. Our mission is to builda financial ecosystem where every African has access to fast and reliable personalised financial tools.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Digital Content Marketing Manager
Job Location:&nbsp;Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Overview


	We are seeking a creative, strategic, and detail-oriented Digital Content Marketing Manager to lead our content marketing efforts.
	The ideal candidate will be responsible for end-to-end planning, creating, and distributing valuable, relevant, and consistent content to attract and retain a clearly defined audience and ultimately drive profitable customer action.


Key Responsibilities
Content Strategy &amp; Planning:


	Develop and execute a comprehensive content strategy aligned with the company&rsquo;s brand, audience, and marketing goals.
	Conduct content audits and gap analyses to identify opportunities for new content and optimisation.
